Based on the <math alttext="K a " overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mi>a</mi></msub></math> values listed in the table above, equal volumes of which of the following pairs of solutions when mixed together will result in a buffer solution with a <math alttext="p H " overflow="scroll"><mi>pH</mi></math> between <math alttext="7 " overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn></math> and <math alttext="8" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn></math> ?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
